value:
I love Deirdre—so much so that even
were my love for her a crime, I would
continue to love her without regret.

Eldigan, my dear friend... Why were
you fated to die?

I know there's a lot of work to do, and
many rely on you.$k$pSurely, though, you can find others
willing to take on some of these tasks.
I, for one, would be happy to help.

My son, Seliph, is safe. Nothing else
could make me happier.

When the fighting is done, I will rejoin
my son, Seliph. This is the promise I
made him.

Are you $Nu?$k$pGood. I bring a letter for you, from
$Nf.

As a descendant of Baldr, I will
not betray your confidence in me.

I must get stronger. My country
and its people need me.
What a poor example I set.

You honor me more than I
deserve. I will repay you.

I am Sigurd. I am the heir to the
duchy of Chalphy and descend from
the crusader Baldr.

When others schemed against us, my
father and I were branded as traitors.
Our family's honor was lost.$k$pI fought to bring the truth to light and
honor back to our name. But I failed.$k$pSeliph fought so hard to dispel the
regrets I left behind, even at his
young age...$k$pThe Scion of Light, eradicating the
darkness, and avenging his father—
that's how people must see him.$k$pOf course, there's more than one way
to look at things. Evil can be seen as
good—and good, evil.$k$pThis is, unfortunately, something I
learned too late.$k$pI must explain this to Seliph. It is my
duty as his father—I must do what I
can to help him become a true king.
はっ！
せいっ！
うああっ！
くっ…だが…
Here I come!
One strike will decide it all!
I cannot allow this.
Raise your sword!
Deirdre, I'm sorry.
(light chuckle)
I'd be honored to have you as an advisor, if you're willing.
Hm? My apologies. Did you call for me?
Your kindness and concern for others is the reason so many people look up to you. I'm sure of it.
I hope I can always count on your strength. It's true. I need your help.
If my love for Deirdre is a crime, please punish me, and only me!
Seliph, I hope that you can forgive me one day. Please... Grow into a strong man. One people look up to.
I swear that I will use every ounce of my strength to protect you.
Very well.
I trust you.
I swear it.
